text:
Adding a mime-type extension to the web.xml file
for a war file does not add the mime-type to the extension.
creator: dev@tomcat.apache.org
B_Adept@email.com
text:
This is only when Tomcat is run as a standalone server.
When Tomcat is hooked into the Apache Web Server mime-types work correctly.

creator: Larry.Isaacs@sas.com
text:
I tried a simple test in Tomcat 3.2.3 and Tomcat 3.3 and a <mime-mapping>
added to web.xml worked successfully.
